body:
# My portfolio

My name is [Brian Hoffman](http://twitter.com/brian_c_hoffman)

* [Mindfulness in Plain English](http://www.urbandharma.org/pdf2/Mindfulness%20in%20Plain%20English%20Book%20Preview.pdf)  - A free ebook on how and why to get started with meditation today

* [Eye Heart New York](http://tumblr.eyeheartnewyork.com) - A Tumblr of my New York photos

* [I Heart NY Museums](http://iheartnymuseums.com/) - A really old interactive map showing open/free hours at local museums

A picture of Chesty Puller's house

![alt text](http://i.imgur.com/5N69Wv7.jpg)

Here's a tribute to Chesty's life:
